items.todoItem: Know that God hates a proud look.
Know that God hates a lying tongue.
Know that God hates hands that shed innocent blood.
Know that God hates a heart that imagines evil thoughts.
Know that God hates feet that are swift in running to mischief.
Know that God hates a false witness who speaks lies.
Know that God hates those that cause disagreement and contention among brethren.
